short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash speed limits in No Limits Of Speed! Play offline by clicking the browser icon. Fast cars, thrilling races, and endless fun!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No Limits of Speed: The ultimate racing game. Navigate challenging courses at lightning-fast speeds with easy controls and offline play. Get ready to race!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" button to initiate the installation process.
2. Pin the No Limits Of Speed extension icon to the Chrome toolbar.
3. Click the No Limits Of Speed icon on the toolbar, and the popup window will appear. Click on the start button to begin the game.

That's it! You are now ready to enjoy the game. Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
1. Use the mouse to control the vehicle's movement - move left or right to steer, and forward to accelerate.
2. Avoid crashing into other vehicles or obstacles on the road to stay alive.
3. Keep an eye on the timer, and reach the finish line before it runs out to advance to the next level.

That's it! Follow these directions, and you will master the game in no time. Good luck and have fun!

WHAT'S NEW?

Upcoming update:  Leaderboard
